Test Name: FSGS and Nephrotic Syndrome Gene Panel
Purpose: To identify genetic variants associated with focal segmental glomerulosclerosis and nephrotic syndrome for clinical diagnosis and research.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit (e.g., QIAamp DNA Mini Kit), spectrophotometer (e.g., NanoDrop), qPCR instrument, sequencing platform (Ion Torrent S5), bioinformatics software (Torrent Suite, IGV, SAMtools)
